effect.name: NTSC
effect.description:
Emulation of NTSC artifacts inspired by the youtube webseries Petscop. DX11 only atm.
Last Updated: 2022-12-04 17:42
effect.author: red, DX11 Port by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: Width
parameter.description: Width in pixels, [!] not of the user's screen but of your pixel art [!]. Affects things such as the scanline density. Leave at default if irrelevant.

parameter.name: Height
parameter.description: Height in pixels, [!] not of the user's screen but of your pixel art [!]. Affects things such as the scanline density. Leave at default if irrelevant.

parameter.name: Quality
parameter.description: The quality of the effect at the cost of performance, with 1 being the highest quality and 0 being the lowest.

parameter.name: Color blur
parameter.description: Smears the colors. When at 0 performance is greatly improved.

parameter.name: Horizontal blur
parameter.description: Blurs the screen. When at 0 performance is improved.

parameter.name: Fringing
parameter.description: Wobbles the screen. When at 0 performance is slightly improved. Don't overdo.

parameter.name: Edges
parameter.description: Fades the edges of the screen.

parameter.name: Sharpening
parameter.description: Sharpening. When at 0 performance is greatly improved.

parameter.name: Invert fringe
parameter.description: [!] Toggle this value every frame [!]. Affects banding and fringing.
